Question.QuestionText: On a scale of 1 to 5 , how would you rate your confidence on being able to handle an emergency - like a health set back or sudden loss of income?
Have you faced any emergency situation in the past?
If yes, what kind of emergency?
Were you able to manage this emergency without having to borrow or sell your assets?
How many months do you think you will be able to manage without an income?
In the event of death or disability of the key earning member in your household, how sure are you that your family will be safe and comfortable? Rate on a scale of 1-5
Do you have Life Insurance?
If yes, what kind?
How much cover does your Life Insurance provide (in ₹)?
Do you have Health Insurance?
Who all in the family are covered under this Health Insurance? Please name them
Are you covered for possible critical illness?
If yes, How much?
Are you covered for possible accidents?
If yes, How much?
Are your assets like house and contents covered?
On a scale of 1 to 5 , how would you rate your confidence on being able to handle all your responsibilities and achieve all your life's dreams comfortably?
What is the Value(in ₹) of Assets you currently have?

Options.Option: Property (Don't include the property you stay in)

Question.QuestionText: How much MONTHLY investment do you do?

Options.Option: Property (Don't include the property you stay in)

Question.QuestionText: On a scale of 1 to 5, how would you rate your preparedness to lead a comfortable life of your choice after retirement?
At what age do you want to retire?
Have you assessed how much money you might need to lead a comfortable retired life?
What kind of retirement benefits does your employment provides?
What is the Value(in ₹) of Assets you currently have for your retirement?
How much MONTHLY investment do you do for your Retirement?
On a scale of 1 to 5, how confident are you that, in the event of your death or disability your assets will be accessible AND distributed to your loved ones easily and legally?
Are all your important investments jointly held?
Is your closest family aware of what all assets / investments you have?
Have you prepared a Will?
Have you given a Power of Attorney to someone who can operate your investments if you are not able to?
On a scale of 1 to 5, how would you rate the amount of control you have on your expenses?
How much is your average monthly expenditure?
How much is your annual household net income?
How much monthly EMI do you pay against your loan?
How many sources of income do you have?
How would you rate your level of comfort with the amount of loan you have? Rate on a scale of 1-5
What kind of loans do you have?
How much is the total outstanding loan amount?
Do you plan to take any loans in future?
If yes, for what purpose?
On a scale of 1 to 5, how would you rate your confidence on handling a financial emergency?
Have you faced any emergency in the last few years?
Please give brief details.
If yes, what kind of emergency?
Were you able to manage the emergency with your savings/income?
How many months do you think you will be able to manage without an income?
In the event of death or disability of the key earning member in your household, how sure are you that your family will be safe and comfortable? Please rate on a scale of 1 to 5?
Do you have Life Insurance?
What kind of policy?
How much cover does your Life Insurance provide (in ₹)?
How much premium do you pay per annum?
Do you have Health Insurance?
If yes, what kind of health insurance?
Who all in the family are covered?
How much is the sum insured?
Are you covered for possible critical illness?
How much are you covered for?
Are you covered for possible accidents?
How much are you covered for?
Are your assets like house and contents covered?
On a scale of 1 to 5, how would you rate your confidence on being able to handle all your responsibilities and achieve all your life's dream comfortably?
Do you have assets to handle your life goals?
What kind?
Do you make any regular investments with an objective to fund specific goals?
What kind?
On a scale of 1 to 5, how would you rate your preparedness to lead a comfortable life of your choice after retirement?
How far is retirement for you?
Have you assessed how much money you might need to lead a comfortable retired life?
What kind of retirement benefits does your employment provides?
Do you make any investment with an objective of funding your retirement needs?
How much do you invest regularly every month for your retirement?
On a scale of 1 to 5, how would you rate your confidence that your asset will be accessible AND distributed to your loved ones easily and legally, in the event of your death / disability?
Are all your important investments jointly held?
Is your closest family aware of what all assets / investments you have?
Have you prepared a Will?
Have you given a Power of Attorney to someone who can operate your investments if you are not able to?
On a scale of 1 to 5, how would you rate the amount of control you have on your expenses?
How much is average spending every month in your household?
What percentage of your expenses is compulsory and non-negotiable?
What percentage of your income are you able to save and invest every month?
How many sources of income do you have?
How would you rate your level of comfort with the amount of debt you carry?
What kind of loans do you service?
What % of your income goes in paying off your loans?
Do you plan to take any loans in future?
If yes, what kind?
